statements: SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level = 10;
SELECT player_name FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_score FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_score DESC, player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5 AND player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_score DESC
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score < 50 ORDER BY player_level ASC
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY player_id
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND player_level IS NOT NULL ORDER BY player_name
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5 AND player_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY player_score DESC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT * FROM high_scores ORDER BY level_completed DESC, score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email, score FROM player_profiles JOIN high_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = high_scores.player_id WHERE score > 500;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_email, player_score FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_email, score, level_completed FROM player_profiles JOIN high_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = high_scores.player_id;
SELECT player_name, score FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN high_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = high_scores.player_id WHERE level_completed >= 5;
SELECT player_name, player_email, player_score, score, level_completed FROM player_profiles LEFT JOIN high_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = high_scores.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_profiles ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_name, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE experience > 1000;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE level = 5 OR level = 10;
SELECT * FROM high_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM player_profiles JOIN items ON player_profiles.player_id = items.player_id;
SELECT player_name, score FROM player_profiles JOIN high_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = high_scores.player_id WHERE high_scores.level = 5;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity, level FROM player_profiles JOIN items ON player_profiles.player_id = items.player_id WHERE player_profiles.level < 5;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, player_score, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score > 1000 ORDER BY player_level ASC, player_score DESC;

SELECT player_name, player_score, level FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN high_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = high_scores.player_id WHERE high_scores.score > 500 ORDER BY level DESC, player_score ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, score FROM player_profiles LEFT JOIN high_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = high_scores.player_id WHERE player_level < 5 AND score IS NULL;
SELECT player_name, level, score FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN high_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = high_scores.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY level ASC, score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username, level FROM player_profiles ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT email FROM player_profiles WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT id, score, level FROM player_high_scores WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_friends WHERE player_id=100 AND friend_id=200;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 10;
SELECT username, email FROM player_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_high_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM player_messages WHERE sender_id = 123 AND receiver_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
